itunes:title: Episode 814​​ - Special Guest NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin
title: Episode 814​​ - Special Guest NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin to talk about the NFL draft, his long and incredible history of partying when he was in the NFL with the Cowboys and in college at Miami, what his life would have been like if ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin to talk about the NFL draft, his long and incredible history of partying when he was in the NFL with the Cowboys and in college at Miami, what his life would have been like if social media existed when he played, hitting Vegas with Dennis Rodman, and the play he regrets the most from his NFL career (against Deion Sanders in the NFC Championship Game).
